Class NetworkEnvironmentSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hfu.anybeam.networkCore.NetworkEnvironmentSettings

  • public class NetworkEnvironmentSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    A class containing all necessary settings for an NetworkEnvironment
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    chrwuer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      NetworkEnvironmentSettings(java.lang.String groupName, java.lang.String deviceName, DeviceType deviceType, EncryptionType encryptionType, int dataPort, int braocastPort, byte[] encryptionKey)
      Creates a new NetworkEnvironmentSettings instance guessing the operating system (will use 'Linux' for Android).

    • Constructor Detail

      • NetworkEnvironmentSettings

        public NetworkEnvironmentSettings(java.lang.String groupName,
                          java.lang.String deviceName,
                          DeviceType deviceType,
                          EncryptionType encryptionType,
                          int dataPort,
                          int braocastPort,
                          byte[] encryptionKey)
        Creates a new NetworkEnvironmentSettings instance guessing the operating system (will use 'Linux' for Android).
        Parameters:
        groupName - the name of the group
        deviceName - the name of the device
        deviceType - the name of the type
        encryptionType - the type of the encryption
        dataPort - the port on which data is transmitted
        braocastPort - the port for broadcast messages
        encryptionKey - the encryption key used

      • NetworkEnvironmentSettings

        Parameters:
        groupName - the name of the group
        deviceName - the name of the device
        deviceType - the name of the type
        encryptionType - the type of the encryption
        dataPort - the port on which data is transmitted
        braocastPort - the port for broadcast messages
        encryptionKey - the encryption key used
        osName - the name of the operating system
